p: Another study revealed the presence of 68 volatile compounds representing 93.3% of T. satureioides aerial parts' total EOs using capillary gas chromatography and gas chromatography coupled to mass spectrometry (GC-MS) [ 40]. These volatile compounds mainly belong to the monoterpenoides class (monoterpene hydrocarbons, oxygenated monoterpenes, and phenolic monoterpenes) such as borneol, carvacrol, thymol, camphene, linalool, and camphor.
